notes_translated.fr: Les indices, les gîtes, les mines et les carrières comprennent les informations se rapportant au pierre architecturale concassée ou industrielle, aux substances non métalliques et aux substances métalliques.
notes_translated.en-t-fr:
Indices, lodgings, mines and quarries include information relating to crushed architectural or industrial stone, non-metallic substances and metallic substances.
